description: Verify Account ID generation strategy: 'TA' + Math.abs(idNo.hashCode()) for a new account opening request.
source_rule_logic: When opening a new account, the system generates the Account ID by concatenating the prefix 'TA' with the absolute value of the hash code of the customer's ID number (`String newAccId = "TA" + Math.abs(idNo.hashCode())`). This generation method is used as the primary key for the Account Map.
